did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Diary includes information on daily activities, visiting with friends, church attendance, and local news of interest to the author.

bioghist.p: The name and age of the young woman who wrote this diary are unknown. She lived with her parents and a brother and sister in Pittsford, N.Y. (Monroe County)

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Diary includes information on daily activities, visiting with friends, church attendance, and local news of interest to the author, June 1863-March 1864.

controlaccess.head: Places:
controlaccess.geogname: Monroe County (N.Y.) -- Social life and customs.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Pittsford (N.Y.) Woman's Diary. #6224. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
